conclusion: Determine the output power and total power of the power source when connected to the small light bulb.
The intersection point of the straight line (a) and the curve (b) is at I = 2 A and U = 2 V.
The intersection point represents the operating point of the circuit.
Calculate the output power: P_out = U x I = 2 V x 2 A = 4 W.
The y-intercept of the straight line (a) is 3 V.
Determine the total power: P_total = emf x I = 3 V x 2 A = 6 W.
The output power of the power source is 4 W.
The total power of the power source is 6 W.
